languages.text: Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок подтверждает, что "Ищущий свет" все еще принадлежит флоту династии фон Валанциус. В иных обстоятельствах фактотум настоял бы, что собственность протектората должна вернуться законному владельцу, но кто знает, что произошло с этим кораблем за минувшие века? Мрачные силы космоса или даже самого варпа могли изменить его...

traits.locale_text: Высокий Фактотум Янрис Данрок подтверждает, что "Ищущий свет" все еще принадлежит флоту династии фон Валанциус. В иных обстоятельствах Фактотум настоял бы, что собственность протектората должна вернуться законному владельцу, но кто знает, что произошло с этим кораблем за минувшие века? Мрачные силы космоса или даже самого варпа могли изменить его...

languages.text: The High Factotum, Janris Danrok, confirms that the Lightseeker is still a part of the von Valancius fleet. In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even the warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...
languages.original_text: Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок подтверждает, что "Ищущий свет" все еще принадлежит флоту династии фон Валанциус. В иных обстоятельствах фактотум настоял бы, что собственность протектората должна вернуться законному владельцу, но кто знает, что произошло с этим кораблем за минувшие века? Мрачные силы космоса или даже самого варпа могли изменить его...

traits.locale_text: The High Factotum Janris Danrok confirms that the Lightseeker is still a part of the House von Valancius fleet. In other circumstances, the Factotum would've insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even warp itself could've corrupted the voidship...

In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...

In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even the warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...

languages.text: 高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克确认了逐光者号目前仍属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝舰队。若是其他情况，他或许会坚持要求收回王朝的财产，可谁知道这艘船在过去的几个世纪里遭遇了什么是事情？无论是宇宙的黑暗力量，还是亚空间本身，都可以早已将这艘虚空舰彻底腐化……
languages.original_text: The High Factotum, Janris Danrok, confirms that the Lightseeker is still a part of the von Valancius fleet. In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even the warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...

traits.locale_text: 高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克确认了逐光者号目前仍属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝舰队。若是其他情况，他或许会坚持要求收回王朝的财产，可谁知道这艘船在过去的几个世纪里遭遇了什么是事情？无论是宇宙的黑暗力量，还是亚空间本身，都可以早已将这艘虚空舰彻底腐化……

languages.text: ハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックは、ライトシーカー号がまだフォン・ヴァランシウスの艦隊の一部であることを確認している。 他の状況であれば、ファクトタムは保護国家の財産を取り戻すことを主張しただろうが、失われた数世紀の間にこの船に何があったのかなど、知る者がいるだろうか？宇宙の闇の力、あるいは<歪み>そのものが、ヴォイドシップを腐敗させたのかもしれない…
languages.original_text: The High Factotum, Janris Danrok, confirms that the Lightseeker is still a part of the von Valancius fleet. In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even the warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...

ハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックは、ライトシーカー号がまだフォン・ヴァランシウスの艦隊の一部であることを確認している。 他の状況であれば、ファクトタムは保護国家の財産を取り戻すことを主張しただろうが、失われた数世紀の間にこの船に何があったのかなど、知る者がいるだろうか？宇宙の闇の力、あるいは<歪み>そのものが、ヴォイドシップを腐敗させたのかもしれない…

languages.text: El Sumo Factótum, Janris Danrok, confirma que el Buscador de Luz sigue formando parte de la flota von Valancius. En otras circunstancias, el Factótum habría insistido en recuperar la propiedad del protectorado, pero ¿quién sabe lo que le habrá ocurrido a la nave durante los siglos que estuvo perdida? Los poderes oscuros del cosmos o la misma disformidad podrían haber corrompido la nave del vacío...
languages.original_text: The High Factotum, Janris Danrok, confirms that the Lightseeker is still a part of the von Valancius fleet. In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even the warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...

traits.locale_text: El Sumo Factótum, Janris Danrok, confirma que el Buscador de Luz sigue formando parte de la flota von Valancius. En otras circunstancias, el Factótum habría insistido en recuperar la propiedad del protectorado, pero ¿quién sabe lo que le habrá ocurrido a la nave durante los siglos que estuvo perdida? Los poderes oscuros del cosmos o la misma disformidad podrían haber corrompido la nave del vacío...

languages.text: Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok bestätigt, dass die Lichtsucher noch immer teil der Valancius-Flotte ist. Unter anderen Umständen würde das Faktotum darauf bestehen, das Eigentum des Protektorats zurückzuholen. Doch wer weiß, was in den Jahrhunderten seit seinem Verschwinden mit dem Schiff geschehen ist? Die dunklen Mächte des Kosmos oder sogar der Warp selbst haben das Raumschiff möglicherweise korrumpiert ...
languages.original_text: The High Factotum, Janris Danrok, confirms that the Lightseeker is still a part of the von Valancius fleet. In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even the warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...

traits.locale_text: Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok bestätigt, dass die Lichtsucher noch immer teil der Flotte des Hauses Valancius ist. Unter anderen Umständen würde das Faktotum darauf bestehen, das Eigentum des Protektorats zurückzuholen. Doch wer weiß, was in den Jahrhunderten seit seinem Verschwinden mit dem Schiff geschehen ist? Die dunklen Mächte des Kosmos oder sogar der Warp selbst haben das Raumschiff möglicherweise korrumpiert ...

Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok bestätigt, dass die Lichtsucher noch immer teil der Flotte des Hauses Valancius ist. Unter anderen Umständen würde das Faktotum darauf bestehen, das Eigentum des Protektorats zurückzuholen. Doch wer weiß, was in den Jahrhunderten seit seinem Verschwinden mit dem Schiff geschehen ist? Die dunklen Mächte des Kosmos oder sogar der Warp selbst haben das Raumschiff möglicherweise korrumpiert ...

languages.text: Le haut factotum Janris Danrok confirme que le Traque-Lumière fait toujours partie de la flotte des von Valancius. En toute autre circonstance, il aurait insisté pour récupérer la propriété du protectorat, mais en l'occurrence, qui sait ce qui a bien pu arriver à ce vaisseau au cours de ces longs siècles de perdition ? Il risque fort d'être corrompu par les forces ténébreuses du cosmos, voire le Warp lui-même...
languages.original_text: The High Factotum, Janris Danrok, confirms that the Lightseeker is still a part of the von Valancius fleet. In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even the warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...

traits.locale_text: Le haut factotum Janris Danrok confirme que le Traque-Lumière fait toujours partie de la flotte des von Valancius. En toute autre circonstance, il aurait insisté pour récupérer la propriété du protectorat, mais en l'occurrence, qui sait ce qui a bien pu arriver à ce vaisseau au cours de ces longs siècles de perdition ? Il risque fort d'être corrompu par les forces ténébreuses du cosmos, voire le Warp lui-même...

languages.text: Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok, Işıkarayan'ın hâlâ von Valancius filosunun bir parçası olduğunu doğruluyor. Başka koşullarda Kâhya, protektoranın malını geri almakta ısrar ederdi ancak yüzyıllar içinde geminin başına neler geldiğini kim bilebilir? Kozmosun karanlık güçleri ya da öteboyutun kendisi, uçsuz gemisini yozlaştırmış olabilir...
languages.original_text: The High Factotum, Janris Danrok, confirms that the Lightseeker is still a part of the von Valancius fleet. In other circumstances, the Factotum would have insisted on reclaiming the property of the protectorate, but who knows what had happened to the vessel during the centuries it was lost? The dark powers of the cosmos or even the warp itself could have corrupted the voidship...
